description: http://anidb.net/ch6847 [Tenjou Utena]`s parents died when she was a little girl. At that time, a prince appeared to her and gave her a signet ring with a rose crest. He told Utena to keep the ring and promised that they would meet again someday. Utena was so impressed by him that she decided to become a prince herself! Utena is all grown up now. She studies at the Ootori Academy and wears her own version of the boys` uniform. She still looks forward to finding her prince, but in the meantime, it`s up to Utena to save damsels in distress and cross swords with Ootori Academy`s top duellists. When Utena unwittingly wins the "Rose Bride" in one such duel, she finds herself in the middle of something else... something that just may lead her to her prince.

REGULAR.description:
In an attempt to defend her best friend`s honor, Utena challenges the kendo captain to a duel.
Source: crunchyroll

By some chance, Utena managed to defeat Saionji in their duel and now he`s determined to have a rematch.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taga Tame ni Bara wa Hohoemu
誰がために薔薇は微笑む

REGULAR.description:
As Utena continues to adjust to life with her new roommate, she starts to realize how few friends Anthy actually has.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On the Night of the Ball

REGULAR.description:
Miki has an interest in Anthy. Miki swears he has no interest in the duels and offers to help tutor Utena and Anthy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 光さす庭・プレリュード

REGULAR.description:
Miki`s starting to realize the extent of Anthy`s loyalty to her role as the Rose Bride.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 光さす庭・フィナーレ

REGULAR.description:
Nanami suspects someone is out to get her. A number of strange events have been occurring, placing her in danger…
Source: crunchyroll

Jury has taken a special interest in Utena lately. She finds Utena`s lack of regard for the dueling game to be sensible.
Source: crunchyroll

A mishap has caused Anthy and Utena to switch bodies. Nanami sets out to find the cure for their predicament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le grand trip du riz au curry
カレーなるハイトリップ

REGULAR.description:
Saionji and Touga reasons for participating in the duels are apparently very different, though they share a common past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eien ga Aru to Iu Shiro
The Castle Said to Hold Eternity
永遠(えいえん)があるという城

REGULAR.description:
Nanami`s possessiveness of her brother has only grown after his injury at the hands of Saionji.
Source: crunchyroll

Even as Utena ponders as to whether or not Touga may be her prince, his plots continue to encircle her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bello e senza scrupoli, chi coglie questo fiore
Gracefully Cruel: The One Who Picks That Flower
Yuuga ni Reikoku: Sono Hana o Tsumu Mono
Élégant et impitoyable, celui qui cueille la fleur
Тот, кто может сорвать этот цветок
優雅に冷酷・その花を摘む者

REGULAR.description:
Utena`s spirit has been crushed. Anthy has betrayed Utena`s trust and only Wakaba will be able to help Utena reclaim her sense of self.
Source: crunchyroll

A look back at all the prior duels and major events with some perspective.
Source: crunchyroll

Utena is introduced to Anthy`s older brother, Akio, who also happens to be the acting chairman for the school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Boys of the Black Rose

REGULAR.description:
Kozue’s feelings for her brother remain most ambiguous... but the Black Rose society knows all.
Source: crunchyroll

Nanami`s just received a priceless piece of jewelry; a Sebastian Dior… cow bell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La cloche de vache du bonheur

REGULAR.description:
As Jury tries her best to ignore Shiori, Mikage`s seminar beckons to her.
Source: crunchyroll

Mitsuru yearns to be more like an adult, but isn`t even sure what that entails. Again, Mikage`s seminar can provide the answers.
Source: crunchyroll

When Wakaba was a child, she had a prince she`d held close in her heart. Well now, her prince has arrived at Ohtori.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Song for a Kingdom Now Lost
Ima wa Naki Oukoku no Uta

REGULAR.description:
Saionji has been shacking up with Wakaba. As she spends time with him, she starts to feel a change within herself.
Source: crunchyroll

Keiko`s always been content with being a member of Nanami`s gang, but her desires for Touga still precede her.
Source: crunchyroll

As Mikage`s down to his last black rose, he stakes his last hopes on allying with Utena.
Source: crunchyroll

As the student council searches for answers as to who`s behind the Black Rose Duelists, Utena is already poised to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

After a mishap puts Mitsuru in the hospital, Utena, Anthy and Nanami stumble upon a diary he`s kept.
Source: crunchyroll

Saionji vows to quit the dueling game. However, Touga and Akio have other plans for him.
Source: crunchyroll

Miki is once again pushed to duel. This time, his sister is the one doing the pushing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il nido di Miki (il giardino di luce: variazione)
Le nid de Kosue (Jardin d`été, arrangement)
Гнездо для Мики (Залитый солнцем сад: Аранжировка)
幹の巣箱(光さす庭・アレンジ)

REGULAR.description:
Nanami is startled to find an egg in her bed. Unsure as to whether or not it`s possible that she`s the mother, she assumes the role.
Source: crunchyroll

Rukia returns. But as to whether he`s back to enjoy life as a student or push Jury`s buttons, it remains to be determined.
Source: crunchyroll

Rukia seeks to ally himself with Jury. However, Jury`s hatred for him has only grown during the time he`s been back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un azur plus bleu que le ciel

REGULAR.description:
As Utena has gotten to know Akio, she`s started to realize that she has feelings for him.
Source: crunchyroll

Nanami`s growing irritation is put into a strange context when she uncovers a horrifying revelation regarding their relationship.
Source: crunchyroll

Nanami does all she can to avoid Touga. However, her feelings for him betray her and force her to face the truth, instead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Romance of the Dancing Girls

REGULAR.description:
Anthy sends Utena on an errand to deliver roses, but little does she realize that Anthy`s plan is also Akio`s plot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il principe che corre nella notte
Le prince qui court dans la nuit
The Prince Who Runs Though The Night

REGULAR.description:
Utena, Anthy, and Akio all go to see a play being put on by the school`s drama club.
Source: crunchyroll

As Akio grows close to Utena, Touga begins to question as to how this will affect the outcome of the duels.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Love That Blossomed in Wintertime
冬のころ 芽ばえた愛

REGULAR.description:
Touga`s resolved to duel with Utena one more time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And Thus Opens the Doorway of Night
Et les portes de la nuit s’ouvrirent
Si aprono le porte della notte
Soshite Yoru no Tobira ga Hiraku

REGULAR.description:
Utena has uncovered the truth behind Anthy and Akio and her disgust for them both has brought her to forsake everything she`s fought for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The One Who Brings the World Revolution
Тот, кто принесёт в мир революцию

REGULAR.description:
Utena has decided to follow the letter`s instructions and proceeds to the dueling arena to meet her prince.
Source: crunchyroll

Utena`s once again betrayed by Anthy. Akio attempts to open the doors of revolution.
Source: crunchyroll
